code: import React from'react';import{MapPin,Wrench,Waves}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Amenities=/*#__PURE__*/React.memo(()=>{const amenities=[{title:"Recreation Areas",description:"Walking trails and common areas for residents to enjoy",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MapPin,{className:"w-10 h-10 text-primary-600 mb-4"})},{title:"Maintenance Services",description:"Professional landscaping and snow removal services",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Wrench,{className:"w-10 h-10 text-primary-600 mb-4"})},{title:"Lake Access",description:"Close proximity to Flathead Lake recreation opportunities",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Waves,{className:"w-10 h-10 text-primary-600 mb-4"})}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"amenities",className:"py-20 bg-white",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-6xl mx-auto px-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-4xl md:text-5xl mb-12 text-center text-primary-600",children:"Community Amenities"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8 mt-12",children:amenities.map((amenity,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-8 rounded-xl shadow-md hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-1 text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-center",children:amenity.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-2xl mb-4 text-primary-700 font-semibold",children:amenity.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-700 leading-relaxed",children:amenity.description})]},index))})]})});});Amenities.displayName='Amenities';export default Amenities;
